title: Ursula Flores: The Time-Bending Consultant
summary: At age 80, Ursula Flores discovers her ability to manipulate time during a critical consulting job to protect her city, using her newfound powers and experience in acting to solve the mystery of a dangerous threat.
summaryGerman: Mit 80 Jahren entdeckt Ursula Flores ihre Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, während sie einen entscheidenden Beratungsauftrag hat, um ihre Stadt zu schützen. Sie nutzt ihre neu gefundenen Kräfte und ihre Erfahrung im Schauspiel, um das Rätsel einer gefährlichen Bedrohung zu lösen.
summaryDutch: Op 80-jarige leeftijd ontdekt Ursula Flores haar vermogen om tijd te manipuleren tijdens een cruciale adviesklus om haar stad te beschermen. Ze gebruikt haar nieuwgevonden krachten en ervaring in acteren om het mysterie van een gevaarlijke dreiging op te lossen.
summaryFrench: À l'âge de 80 ans, Ursula Flores découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps pendant un travail de consultation critique pour protéger sa ville, utilisant ses nouveaux pouvoirs et son expérience d'actrice pour résoudre le mystère d'une menace dangereuse.

story.text: Ursula Flores starts her week with a simple consultation job. However, she suddenly experiences a strange sensation and witnesses the clock hands moving backwards. Mood: eerie
After the bizarre incident, Ursula experiments and realizes she can control time. She decides to use this power to review historical city plans for an upcoming urban renewal project. Mood: triumphant
While consulting, Ursula reverses time to prevent a disastrous construction blunder. Her actions start to attract attention. Mood: energetic
Ursula uses her acting skills to disguise her identity and keep her powers hidden. She meets with city officials under an alias to guide them without revealing her secret. Mood: romantic
Mysterious forces notice Ursula's time interventions. They confront her demanding she cease her actions. Ursula refuses, leading to a showdown. Mood: epic
Ursula strategically uses her time-bending in combination with her acting to outsmart her foes, ensuring the city's safety and proper development. Mood: triumphant
Ursula reflects on her week, realizing the potential and responsibility of her powers. She vows to protect her city and its future, accepting her role as 'The Time-Bending Consultant.' Mood: peaceful

ending: Ursula Flores, with time on her side, becomes a silent guardian of her beloved city.
moral: Age is just a number, and unexpected talents can emerge at any moment to shape our destiny.
